cards.name: Mighty Blow
cards.description: A powerful attack with your weapon. Put all your strength behind it!
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+4 to hit, d8 damage
cards.illustration: A muscular arm bringing down a massive two-handed sword in a devastating overhead strike, impact sparks flying, stone cracking beneath the blow

cards.name: Shield Wall
cards.description: Raise your defenses to protect yourself or someone nearby from harm.
cards.mechanics: Reduce incoming damage by 5
cards.illustration: A tower shield raised high, arrows and spear tips deflecting off its surface with sparks, protective stance with boots planted firmly

cards.name: Battle Cry
cards.description: Let out a mighty shout! Scare your enemies and inspire your allies.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+3 vs Enemy Morale DC 12
cards.illustration: A warrior with head thrown back, mouth open in a thunderous roar, visible shockwave emanating outward, enemies recoiling in fear

cards.name: Reckless Strike
cards.description: Attack with everything you've got! More damage, but you leave yourself open.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+6 to hit, but enemies get +2 to hit you
cards.illustration: A wild lunging attack with weapon extended fully forward, leaving the warrior's guard completely open, desperate and powerful

cards.name: Disarm
cards.description: Knock the weapon right out of your enemy's hand!
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+3 opposed check
cards.illustration: A sword being twisted and knocked away from an enemy's grip, the weapon spinning through the air, hands empty and surprised

cards.name: Grapple
cards.description: Grab your enemy and hold them tight! They can't move while you've got them.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+4 to grab, enemy can't move
cards.illustration: Powerful arms wrapped around an opponent in a wrestling hold, muscles straining, neither fighter able to escape the other's grip

cards.name: Precise Shot
cards.description: Take careful aim at your target. One shot, one hit.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+4 to hit, d6 damage
cards.illustration: An arrow mid-flight, perfectly aimed, leaving a bow string still vibrating, target in the distance about to be struck

cards.name: Quick Shot
cards.description: Fire rapidly! Less accurate, but you get two shots.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+2 to hit TWICE
cards.illustration: Two arrows flying through the air simultaneously, rapid-fire archery, hands blurred with speed, quiver arrows depleting

cards.name: Track
cards.description: Follow trails, find footprints, discover hidden paths others would miss.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+5 for tracking/investigation
cards.illustration: A hand pointing at animal tracks in soft earth, broken twigs, and disturbed leaves forming a trail into the forest

cards.name: Sneak
cards.description: Move like a shadow. No one sees you coming.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+4 stealth check
cards.illustration: A cloaked figure melting into shadows between trees, only eyes visible, guards in the background completely unaware

cards.name: Trap
cards.description: Set a trap to catch enemies, or carefully disarm one blocking your path.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+3 to set/disarm, d8 trap damage
cards.illustration: A rope snare being carefully set among leaves, or a bear trap being disarmed with steady hands, tension in the moment

cards.name: Animal Friendship
cards.description: Calm a wild beast or befriend an animal. They sense your good heart.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+3 vs animal's will
cards.illustration: A hand extended gently toward a wild wolf, the wolf's posture softening from aggressive to curious, eyes meeting with understanding

cards.name: Magic Bolt
cards.description: Blast your enemy with pure magical energy from up to 60 feet away!
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+4 to hit, d6 damage
cards.illustration: A crackling bolt of blue-white magical energy shooting from an outstretched hand, arcing toward a distant target with electric intensity

cards.name: Shield Spell
cards.description: A shimmering magical barrier appears to block an incoming attack!
cards.mechanics: +5 Defense for one attack
cards.illustration: A translucent dome of shimmering blue energy materializing just in time to deflect an incoming arrow or blade, magical runes flickering

cards.name: Illusion
cards.description: Create a fake image or sound to trick your enemies!
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+4, enemies must see through it
cards.illustration: A ghostly duplicate image of a person or creature shimmering into existence, slightly transparent, fooling onlookers

cards.name: Telekinesis
cards.description: Move objects with your mind! Push, pull, or lift up to 50 pounds.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+3
cards.illustration: Objects floating in mid-air surrounded by a purple glow, an outstretched hand with fingers spread, concentration visible on face

cards.name: Detect Magic
cards.description: Your senses open to the magical world. You can feel magic within 30 feet.
cards.mechanics: AUTOMATIC - No roll needed
cards.illustration: Eyes glowing with arcane sight, magical auras visible as colored glows around enchanted objects, hidden runes revealed

cards.name: Enchant
cards.description: Temporarily infuse an item with magical power!
cards.mechanics: +2 bonus to one item, one use
cards.illustration: Hands hovering over a sword as magical energy flows into it, the blade beginning to glow with arcane runes appearing along its length

cards.name: Healing Light
cards.description: Golden light flows from your hands, healing wounds and restoring health.
cards.mechanics: Heal d8+2 hit points
cards.illustration: Warm golden light emanating from open palms, washing over a wounded ally, cuts and bruises fading, peaceful expression of relief

cards.name: Bless
cards.description: Grant good fortune to yourself or an ally. The gods smile upon them!
cards.mechanics: +2 bonus to next roll
cards.illustration: A hand raised in blessing, golden motes of light descending upon the blessed person, a subtle halo forming momentarily

cards.name: Smite
cards.description: Channel holy power into your attack! Your weapon blazes with radiant light.
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+3 to hit, d8 radiant damage
cards.illustration: A weapon wreathed in brilliant golden flames, mid-swing against a shadowy foe, holy light searing the darkness

cards.name: Turn Undead
cards.description: Holy light bursts from you, forcing undead creatures to flee in terror!
cards.mechanics: Roll d20+4 vs undead
cards.illustration: A radiant burst of holy light exploding outward, skeletal figures recoiling and fleeing, shadows burning away in the brilliance

cards.name: Protection Circle
cards.description: Draw a sacred circle on the ground. Evil creatures cannot enter!
cards.mechanics: Creates safe zone evil cannot enter
cards.illustration: A glowing golden circle inscribed on the ground with holy symbols, dark creatures pressing against an invisible barrier unable to cross

cards.name: Divine Guidance
cards.description: Pray for wisdom. The gods send you a vision or whisper a hint.
cards.mechanics: Ask the DM for one helpful clue
cards.illustration: A figure kneeling in prayer, a beam of light from above, a ghostly vision or symbol appearing in the light, divine wisdom descending
